data.name: Sex Adventures - Futanari Doctor
data.detailed_description:
A visual novel about young woman who visits her doctor with an embarrassing problem.
It turns out that her female doctor is a futanari.

Visual Novel Description

Miyu, a beautiful young woman, goes desperately to the doctor with an embarrassing problem.
She complains that whatever she’s doing, she just can’t have an orgasm.
After a series of intimate questions, the doctor still fails to establish a diagnosis.
She then asks her patient to lie on her back and undress for a physical consultation.
Everything seems alright, but that doesn’t help the sexually frustrated girl.
The situation takes a turn when the doctor asks her if she agrees with a different treatment.
Miyu is certainly not ready for what is to come.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
